bibl.title: Land and Status in Ptolemaic Egypt: The Status Designation "Occupation Title + B3K + Divine Name".

series.title: Untersuchungen zum Rechtsleben im alten Ägypten.

bibl.note: Voir pp. 162-164: Greek Equivalents (ἐνκάτοχος or ἱερόδουλος?). The Egyptian title was not translated into Greek. It is used as a status designator in demotic contracts.

bibl.title: Grund und Boden in Altägypten. Akten des internationalen Symposions, Tübingen 18.-20. Juni 1990

bibl.seg: MANNING J.G., Land and Status in Ptolemaic Egypt: The Status Designation "Occupation Title + B3K + Divine Name".
Grund und Boden in Altägypten. Akten des internationalen Symposions, Tübingen 18.-20. Juni 1990 = Untersuchungen zum Rechtsleben im alten Ägypten. 2 (Tübingen, 1994) pp. 147-175.
Voir pp. 162-164: Greek Equivalents (ἐνκάτοχος or ἱερόδουλος?). The Egyptian title was not translated into Greek. It is used as a status designator in demotic contracts.
